forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of rain and freezing rain this morning. Light rain this afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening will become a mixture of wintry precipitation overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening will become a mixture of wintry precipitation overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
